nodes.text: The Special Forces Command was the Army branch of the Galactic Empire that operated the army's Imperial Army Special Missions troopers, deadly clandestine soldiers that were primarily deployed to conduct high-risk, black-ops missions.

The Galactic Empire's Special Forces Command was mentioned in Dawn of Rebellion, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2018.
